Package org.drip.coverage.xva

XVA Module Code Coverage Estimation Suite
Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Burgard2011
    Burgard2011 holds the JUnit Code Coverage Tests for the Burgard-Kjaer (2011) XVA Module.
    Burgard2012
    Burgard2012 holds the JUnit Code Coverage Tests for the Burgard-Kjaer (2012) XVA Module.
    Burgard2013
    Burgard2013 holds the JUnit Code Coverage Tests for the Burgard-Kjaer (2013) XVA Module.
    Netting
    Netting holds the JUnit Code Coverage Tests for the Netting XVA Module.
    Piterbarg2010
    Piterbarg2010 holds the JUnit Code Coverage Tests for the Piterbarg (2010) XVA Module.
    Piterbarg2012
    Piterbarg2012 holds the JUnit Code Coverage Tests for the Piterbarg (2012) XVA Module.
    XVA
    XVA holds the JUnit Code Coverage Tests for the Core XVA Module.
    XVABasel
    XVABasel holds the JUnit Code Coverage Tests for the Basel Accounting XVA Module.
    XVADigest
    XVADigest holds the JUnit Code Coverage Tests for the Metrics Digest for the XVA Module.
    XVAStrategy
    XVAStrategy holds the JUnit Code Coverage Tests for the Strategy Metrics for the XVA Module.
